name: scorekeeper2
description: Hockey scorekeeper application with automated Azure deployment

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: echo 'Starting production build process...' && echo 'Installing frontend dependencies...' && cd frontend && npm install --include=dev && echo 'Frontend dependencies installed' && echo 'Building frontend application...' && npm run build && echo 'Frontend build complete!' && echo 'Verifying build output...' && (ls -la dist/ || dir dist) && echo 'Installing backend dependencies...' && cd ../backend && npm install && echo 'Backend dependencies installed' && echo 'Production build completed successfully!'
scripts.deploy:setup: echo 'Follow DEPLOYMENT.md for Azure setup instructions'
scripts.test: echo 'Running tests...' && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend

author: Chattanooga Hockey
